title: Add delta save tracking to sidepanel.js (fix snowball)
Add [SCREENSHOT] marker insertion to screenshot button in sidepanel.js
Fix transcript snowball duplication and screenshot button [SCREENSHOT] marker
Add delta save tracking to tradescape/dictation.js
Fix snowball text duplication: save only new text delta instead of full transcript
close_reason: Added lastSavedTranscription tracking; onresult and stopListening now send only delta text to server; handleScreenshotCommand also saves delta after replacement

title: Fix Google engine session restart accumulation in sidepanel.js
Apply same fixes to tradescape/dictation.js and exponential/dictation.js
close_reason: Applied delta-save and screenshot button [SCREENSHOT] marker fixes to both tradescape/dictation.js and exponential/dictation.js

title: Add context input and status to Save Page panel HTML/CSS
Fix cumulative Whisper transcription â€” rewrite audio processor
Fix ONNX Runtime WASM loading in Chrome extension
description: The bundled whisper worker tries to dynamically import ONNX Runtime from cdn.jsdelivr.net, which is blocked by the extension's CSP (script-src 'self'). Need to copy ONNX Runtime files locally and configure transformers.js to use them.
close_reason: Fixed: copy ORT WASM files locally, set wasmPaths to local extension dir, use module worker for dynamic imports

title: Rewrite audio-processor.js with pre-allocated buffer
description: Replace growing Array + slice pattern with pre-allocated Float32Array and write index. Remove overlap. Fixes root cause of cumulative audio chunks.

title: Add diagnostic logging to whisper-worker.js
description: Log audioData.length in transcribe() to verify chunks are constant size (~80000 at 16kHz)

title: Screenshot button should insert [SCREENSHOT] marker into transcript
close_reason: takeScreenshot() now appends [SCREENSHOT] marker to currentTranscription and saves delta when recording is active

title: Remove deduplicateOverlap band-aid from sidepanel.js
description: Remove deduplicateOverlap() and revert onresult to simple append. Keep [SCREENSHOT] replacement, cooldown, and new-text-only screenshot check.

title: Replace page.savePage with action.quickCreate in sidepanel JS
Remove overlap option from speech-engine-whisper.js
description: Change AudioWorkletNode processorOptions to { chunkDuration: 5 } without overlap

title: Screen annotation overlay for screenshots
description: Add ability to draw red arrows and freehand annotations on the screen while dictating. Annotations are captured in screenshots via captureVisibleTab(). Includes: content script canvas overlay (shared/annotation-overlay.js), UI controls in sidepanel + dictation windows, keyboard shortcut (Ctrl+Shift+D), auto-clear after screenshot. See plan file: .claude/plans/piped-pondering-quasar.md

title: Add delta save tracking to exponential/dictation.js
Build and verify fixes end-to-end
Add [SCREENSHOT] marker insertion to screenshot button in dictation.js (both variants)
Remove popup, move API key setup into side panel
description: Eliminate the popup dropdown entirely. When the extension icon is clicked, open the side panel directly. If no API key is stored, show a setup form in the side panel. Once the API key is saved, switch to the dictation UI. For Exponential variant, also handle project selection in the side panel.
close_reason: Implemented: popup removed, side panel opens directly with inline API key setup and project selection

title: Replace Google Speech API with Local Whisper + Side Panel
description: Add local Whisper (transformers.js) as default speech engine with Google webkitSpeechRecognition as toggle fallback. Replace detached dictation window with Chrome Side Panel. See plan: .claude/plans/modular-mapping-spark.md
close_reason: All 11 child issues completed. Local Whisper + side panel implementation done.

title: Package setup: create package.json with @huggingface/transformers and esbuild
description: Create package.json at project root. Add @huggingface/transformers and esbuild as dependencies. Run npm install.

title: Update build.sh for new dependencies and files
description: Add npm install step. Add npx esbuild to bundle whisper-worker.js with transformers.js. Copy WASM runtime files from node_modules to shared/transformers/. Copy all new shared files into each variant.
close_reason: Updated build.sh with npm install, esbuild bundling, and shared file cleanup

title: End-to-end verification
description: Load extension in Chrome dev mode. Test side panel opens from popup. Test Whisper engine: model download, recording, transcription, screenshot command, server sync. Test Google engine toggle. Test engine preference persistence. Test offline with Whisper.
close_reason: All 4 dist variants verified: manifests correct, all files present, configs correct

title: Audio capture worklet: shared/audio-processor.js
description: AudioWorkletProcessor that buffers 16kHz mono PCM. Emits 5-second chunks with 1-second overlap to prevent word-boundary splits.

title: Whisper Web Worker: shared/whisper-worker.js
description: Loads onnx-community/whisper-tiny.en (q8 quantized, ~39MB) via transformers.js pipeline. Receives Float32Array PCM chunks, returns transcript text. Reports model download progress back to UI.

title: Speech engine abstraction: google and whisper wrappers
description: Create shared/speech-engine-whisper.js: manages AudioWorklet + Worker, exposes start(), stop(), onresult callback. Create shared/speech-engine-google.js: wraps webkitSpeechRecognition with same interface. Both call onresult(transcriptText) so the rest of the app is engine-agnostic.

title: Side panel UI: shared/sidepanel.html and sidepanel.js
description: Adapt layout and server sync logic from existing dictation.js. Add model download progress bar for first-time use. Add engine toggle: Local (Whisper) / Google saved to chrome.storage.local as SPEECH_ENGINE. Port transcript display, screenshot command detection, session URL from dictation.js.

title: Background service worker: shared/background.js
description: Configure side panel behavior via chrome.sidePanel.setPanelBehavior. Handle mic permission state. Listen for messages from side panel and permissions page.

title: Mic permissions flow: shared/permissions.html and permissions.js
description: One-time page that calls getUserMedia() to get browser permission grant. After granted, side panel can capture audio freely. Store MIC_PERMISSION_GRANTED flag in chrome.storage.local.

title: Update manifests for both variants
description: Both exponential/manifest.json and tradescape/manifest.json: add sidePanel permission, side_panel config, background service worker with type module, wasm-unsafe-eval in CSP, new web_accessible_resources.
close_reason: Updated both manifests with sidePanel, background worker, wasm-unsafe-eval CSP, new resources

title: Update popup.js files to open side panel
description: Both popup.js files: change Start Dictation button handler from chrome.windows.create() to chrome.sidePanel.open().
close_reason: Updated both popup.js files to use chrome.sidePanel.open() with fallback

title: Move handleScreenshotCommand replacement before async callback
